name: AGENT 00111 Demo
detailed_description:
Agent 00111 is a platform puzzle that should become part of a hacker organization, you are assigned to take a test task, hack a computer. Each level is a puzzle that must be solved to bypass the security system. Solve problems and download megabytes of useful information.

Game features
- Solve puzzles to get information
- Pump the abilities of the main character
- To open some doors, you need to pass a mini game.

Features Demo version.

- You have 2 missions available.
- You have 1000 mb for installing skliov.

short_description: To charge to pass a test task, hack the computer. Solve problems and download megabytes of useful information. Discover new skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 1000MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 monitor format
